# How to Unlock Garmin Maps with Garmin Unlock Generator v1.7 45
 
If you have a Garmin GPS device and want to use maps from other sources, you may need to unlock them first. Unlocking maps allows you to use them on any Garmin device without restrictions. One way to do this is by using a software called Garmin Unlock Generator v1.7 45.
 
Garmin Unlock Generator v1.7 45 is a tool that can generate unlock codes for various Garmin maps. It can also unlock maps that are locked by region or device ID. To use this tool, you need to have the map file (.img) and the device ID of your Garmin device.
 
**Download File ··· [https://kolbgerttechan.blogspot.com/?l=2uwWm3](https://kolbgerttechan.blogspot.com/?l=2uwWm3)**


 
Here are the steps to use Garmin Unlock Generator v1.7 45:
 
1. Download and extract the tool from [this link](https://archive.org/details/garmingpsunlockkeycodegenerator).[^1^]
2. Run the tool and select the map file (.img) that you want to unlock.
3. Enter the device ID of your Garmin device. You can find it by going to Settings > System > About on your device.
4. Click on Generate and wait for the tool to create the unlock code.
5. Copy the unlock code and paste it into a text file named gmapsupp.unl.
6. Save the text file in the same folder as the map file (.img).
7. Copy both files to your Garmin device or SD card in the folder named Garmin.
8. Restart your Garmin device and enjoy your unlocked map.

Note: This tool may not work for all maps or devices. Use it at your own risk. Some maps may require additional steps or files to work properly. Always backup your original files before modifying them.
